inclusion.criterion: Postmenopausal > 1 year since last menstrual period
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Positive treadmill exercise test for myocardial ischemia
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Reported angina pectoris > 2 episodes per week
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of any other chronic illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another research study within the previous 60 days
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suffer any physical condition for which exercise is a contra-indication.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to give written informed consent
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple chronic conditions, including COPD and CHF. However, they are willing to participate in the study.
